text: Halli keihi mikhumna-ah innada jarra kangamna angjet in Pumi diang kheella malung inngamna innei, hiwajarra inmani'n chongkahoi kha1:14 chongkahoi kha, aleiilaak larik ah chu Pathian chong tia inthul. apharakip ah kachi omlekleiya kheella rilsuoknasik ah malung inngamnakha hong-insoonnasik eii.
